name: Iron Talon
lore: A simple but effective weapon devised to quell a great Hellbear uprising.

descriptions.name: Chop
descriptions.description: Targets a non-player enemy unit to remove 40% of its current HP.If cast on a tree or ward, instantly destroys it.Unit Range: 350Tree Range: 350Ward Range: 450

descriptions.name: Quell
descriptions.description: Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 24 for melee heroes, and 7 for ranged.
